## Checker.isIn() method

Verify if a value is in an array, then throw if not

**Signature:**

```typescript
isIn(arr: any[], value: any, name?: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arr | any\[\] | The array |
|  value | any | The value needed |
|  name | string | _(Optional)_ Use to trace in the error |

**Returns:**

boolean
